name: ciam-integration-suite
description: Complete CIAM Integration Suite with Account Servicing

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=ciam-backend && npm install --workspace=ciam-ui && npm install --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm install --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ciam-ui" "npm run dev:storefront" "npm run dev:account"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run build --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run build --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run build --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.test:all: npm run test --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run test --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run test --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run test --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run test:unit --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run test:unit --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run test:unit --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run test:coverage --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run test:coverage --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run lint --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run lint --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run lint --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
scripts.format:all: npm run format --workspace=ciam-backend && npm run format --workspace=ciam-ui && npm run format --workspace=storefront-web-app && npm run format --workspace=account-servicing-web-app
